short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MessengerBEAST for optimizing and organizing Sales Pipelines and communications in FB Messenger.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MessengerBEAST allows you to organize your Facebook Messenger contacts and conversations, as well as optimize your interactions.

You no longer have to sort through messages to see where a prospect is in the sales pipeline. No longer type the same words and messages over and over again, or copy and paste to leads from a text file. You can forgetting who you set appointments with, or when you were to call them or send a follow-up.

You can also: 

- Track leads: The built-in CRM for Messenger keeps track of all prospects and leads right inside Messenger without ever needing to look anywhere else.

- Using customizable color-coded labels, each Friend is tagged with a descriptive label: Prospect, Lead, Hot Lead, Client, Friend, Family, etc. Keep track of everyone ever messaged and never lose a Messenger sale ever again! 

- Sort by Labels, and by who sent the last message.

- Schedule Notifications: Easily schedule notifications right inside Messenger and get a browser notification, and/or send to a web-hook to put the notification on your favorite calendar app, such a iCal or Google Calendar

- Automate: With customizable Canned Responses, you can now find things you repeatedly type, and add them to the chat window with just a click of the mouse. Even add emoji's, and personalize the contact's name anywhere within a Canned Response!

- Web hooks: Send info to your calendar, or other places you need to use it or be reminded of it, wherever you need it.

This CRM tool is an huge time-saver and will keep you organized and on top of your contacts and sales pipelines - never lose another lead or appointment again.
